and <S%G2532><s%> kept back <S%G3557><s%> part of <S%G575><s%> the price, <S%G5092><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> being aware <S%G4894><s%> of it, <S%G2532><s%> and brought <S%G5342><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> part, <S%G3313><s%> and laid <S%G5087><s%> it at <S%G3844><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%>' feet. <S%G4228><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> the high priest, <S%G2409><s%> the captain <S%G4755><s%> of the temple, <S%G2411><s%> <S%G5037><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the chief <S%G4755><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> they were very perplexed <S%G1280><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%> and <S%G5101><s%> what <S%G302><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> of this. <S%G5124><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> they had brought <S%G71><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> they set <S%G2476><s%> them <S%G846><s%> before <S%G1722><s%> the council. <S%G4892><s%> The high priest <S%G749><s%> questioned <S%G1905><s%> them, <S%G846><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Didn't <S%G3756><s%> we <S%G3853><s%> strictly <S%G3852><s%> command <S%G3853><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> <S%G1321><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> name? <S%G3686><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> you have filled <S%G4137><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> with <S%G1322><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> teaching, <S%G1322><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> intend <S%G1014><s%> to bring <S%G1863><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man <S%G444><s%>'s blood <S%G129><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us. <S%G2248><s%>"

God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G5312><s%> exalted <S%G5312><s%> him <S%G5126><s%> with <S%G1188><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%> to be a Prince <S%G747><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a Savior, <S%G4990><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> to Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> remission <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

But they, <S%G1161><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> this, <S%G1282><s%> were cut to the heart, <S%G2532><s%> and determined <S%G1011><s%> to kill <S%G337><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> Theudas <S%G2333><s%> rose up, <S%G450><s%> making <S%G3004><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> out to be <S%G1511><s%> somebody; <S%G5100><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> a number <S%G706><s%> of men, <S%G435><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> four hundred, <S%G5071><s%> joined themselves: <S%G4347><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was slain; <S%G337><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> obeyed <S%G3982><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> were dispersed, <S%G1262><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> man, <S%G2455><s%> Judas of Galilee <S%G1057><s%> rose up <S%G450><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of the enrollment, <S%G582><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drew away <S%G868><s%> some people <S%G2992><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> He also <S%G2548><s%> perished, <S%G622><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> as <S%G3745><s%> many as <S%G3745><s%> obeyed <S%G3982><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> were scattered abroad. <S%G1287><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> you will <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> able to overthrow <S%G2647><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and you would be found <S%G2147><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to be fighting against God! <S%G2314><s%>"

They <S%G1161><s%> agreed <S%G3982><s%> with him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Summoning <S%G4341><s%> the apostles, <S%G652><s%> they <S%G2532><s%> beat <S%G1194><s%> them and commanded <S%G3853><s%> them not <S%G3361><s%> to <S%G2980><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G630><s%> them <S%G846><s%> go. <S%G630><s%>
